technologies.name: Green Chemical Production Processes
technologies.evidence: The ALTA GROUP started as a consultancy for sustainable chemical and physical process solutions. This service is still provided today.

technologies.name: Energy Materials
technologies.evidence: ...invest in manufacturing facilities for the production of green organic carbonates in order to supply components for electrolytes to be used in the booming battery market in Europe.

technologies.name: Biotechnology (focused on molecules and cells)
technologies.evidence: ...manufacture & sales of green organic cyclic and lineair carbonates.
